Text: By the way, you guys are going to need to keep seeding this, because I pay for every bit of my bandwidth, and I have to leave seeding it once it's fully uploaded. Thanks

To install, extract all these to [drive]:\steam\steamapps\common\left 4 dead 2\left 4 dead 2\addons

Note that there are two "left 4 dead 2" subfolders within each other. Also, in order to run them, you need to install the "Left 4 Dead 2 Add-On Support" tool, within your Steam Tools
